Update.Config.PublicKey.Description.other: Oficiālā atslēga ar kuru pārbaudīt datu parakstu.

Update.Config.Channel.Description.other: Kanāls no kura izmanto atjauninājumus. Palieciet pie Stabila ja neesat pārliecināts.

Update.Config.ProxyHost.Description.other: Starpniekservera nosaukums ja nepieciešams priekš izejošajiem pieslēgumiem

Update.Config.Disable.Description.other: If your server has no access to outside world, do not try contact update site.

Update.Process.Finished.other: Binary package has been successfully verified, you can now restart the service.

Update.SetCapDetected.Warning.other: WARNING: you are using a reserved port on one your binding url. This requires a root capability to start web service.
